articles.title: J. Lo, Billie Eilish and Rod Stewart grab American Music Awards headlines - BBC

articles.content:

articles.title: Charles Rangel, powerful voice for Harlem in Congress, dies at 94 - The Washington Post
articles.description: He became the first African American chairman of the House Ways and Means Committee but was forced to relinquish that coveted position because of financial transgressions.
